message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.GR 

The paper proposes a gesture-based communication pipeline for divers to instruct an Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV) to assist them in performing high-risk tasks and helping in case of emergency. The paper involves the development of a gesture communication language (CADDIAN) and a hierarchical classification approach for hand gesture recognition based on stereo imagery and multi-descriptor aggregation to specifically cope with underwater image artifacts. This work involves the use of computer vision, robotics, human-computer interaction, artificial intelligence, and graphics. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.RO (Robotics), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.GR (Graphics).
